resource_kwargs.title: Resource Kwargs
resource_kwargs.description: Additional argument to pass to the Handler to read a Resource

resource_path.title: Resource Path
resource_path.description: Filepath or URI for locating this resource

root.title: Root
root.description: Subset of resource_path that is a local detail, not semantic.

spec.title: Spec
spec.description: String identifying the format/type of this Resource, used to identify a compatible Handler

uid.title: Uid
uid.description: Globally unique identifier for this Resource
